name: 發現臺灣
goals: 讓學生了解台灣文獻典藏情況、重要文獻的內容及當今研究成果
對台灣語言、文化、文學的主體性具有使命感與承諾。
認知台灣歷史學與文化學的趨勢與走向
將台灣文化、語言及文學應用於母語教學、鄉土教學或國際交流與跨文化翻譯活動之中
syllabus:
**發現臺灣**

In this course we explore "discover Taiwan" from several angles: history, literature, anthropology, geography, linguistics and politics. The purpose of this course is to thematically guide the student through the academic discipline of Taiwan Studies, enabling the student to discover for him/herself aspects of Taiwan society and culture that may trigger further academic interest. The nature of the course is encyclopedic.
